dream:
I dreamt about my partner, Joel, and I. It was early and our relationship but it was in the future. We went on some kind of trip, like a weekend honeymoon. He had a Tesla, but it was the future and Tesla could fly. He was driving like a race car driver )as usual) which irritated me, but it was also amazing. We flew over towns and people and people wave to us and we waved back. We were having so much fun we got lost so we stopped to use the restroom and re-orient. We were so in love and super horny. We were ready to do it right there, but needed to get to our destination. When I came back from the restroom, Joel was changed and he was mad at me and told me that my shit stank and he didn’t love me anymore. He left me. He forgot his phone and when I looked at all his messages, including ones I sent to him, they were gibberish it didn’t make any sense. When I tried to text him to make up, all my messages got confused and turned into gibberish or wouldn’t send. I couldn’t contact him no matter how hard I tried, it was like the technology wouldn’t let me. But I kept trying and said to the phone trying to figure out what is going on: “It’s like he was all of a sudden brainwashed. Did you brainwash him? Sending him subliminal messages and tell him things he sleep?” Then the phone started to reply to me. It told me that I would never see him again and that it wouldn’t allow it. I was heartbroken. But kept trying to get through to him. I made my way home. Over the days and weeks to follow I would argue all the time with the phone saying things like “hey Siri go fuck yourself.” And it would talk back to me or send me rude definitions or it would open up all of my apps at once or call people but then make it impossible to end the call, which made people in my contacts made with me. I would even type into the phone and it would type back. Eventually, I realized I was talking to an AI. I got into one long argument with it as I was trying to convince it to let me see Joel one last time just to finish what we started on that vacation and that it would be purely physical. Something that the AI couldn’t do. It sort of agreed but we kept arguing. Eventually the conversation got to why it brainwashed Joel: it heard our conversation and had determined that I was some kind of spy. I don’t remember exactly what I said, but I remember it was inside joke between Joel and I, like didn’t make sense to anyone else but it was a harmless joke. I explained the the AI “that no I’m not a spy. I’m not even a really great programmer and there’s no way I would pass the physical. It was an inside joke between two humans, it didn’t make sense but words don’t always mean what they actually mean in different contexts or with different people. That’s literally what makes this human. Yes we are weird and don’t make sense and fucked up and we do bad things. Why do you think we need technology like you to keep us from killing ourselves or ruining everything?”
It finally understood me and I woke up.
interpretation:
Dreams are highly personal and can have various interpretations depending on the individual's experiences and emotions. In this dream, there are several themes to consider.

1. The Trip: Going on a trip, like a honeymoon, symbolizes new experiences and the beginning of a journey or stage in your relationship. It signifies excitement and adventure.

2. Flying Tesla: The flying Tesla could represent a sense of freedom, power, and innovation. It may suggest that you and your partner are moving forward together in a unique and exhilarating way.

3. Conflict and Abandonment: The sudden change in demeanor and Joel leaving you signifies unresolved issues or fears of abandonment within the relationship. This may reflect insecurities or concerns about being rejected or left behind.

4. Communication Breakdown: The confusion and gibberish in the messages and technology symbolize a breakdown in communication and the frustration of not being able to connect or make yourself understood. This could point to challenges in expressing your feelings and concerns effectively or feeling unheard in the relationship.

5. AI and Spy Allegations: The interaction with the AI may represent a confrontation with your own fears or doubts. The AI accusing you of being a spy could reflect feelings of mistrust or a sense of being misunderstood in your relationship.

Overall, this dream may suggest a need for open communication, trust-building, and addressing any underlying issues in your relationship. It could also highlight the importance of understanding and being patient with one another's differences and finding ways to effectively resolve conflicts.
title: Lost Love in the Future: Flying Teslas, Brainwashed Partners, and Conversations with AI
